synopsis.text: Mamerry Christmas, 5th Mameversary, and more! Dive into the delightful world of Mameshiba with these assorted shorts that are not part of the regular episodes, new series, or collaborations. Enjoy the Christmas spirit with Mameshiba caroling in claymation in the Mamerry Christmas-hen. Celebrate the 5th anniversary of Mameshiba with the 5-Shuunen Party-hen, also in claymation. Watch in awe as Mameshiba rolls down a hill in Sakamichi Korokoro-hen, and observe them up close under a magnifying glass in Kansatsu-hen. Plus, don't miss the Mameshiba music video promoting the official YouTube channel launch, and the Mameshiba Song that will teach you all about Mameshiba Beans of Trivia. With special episodes for Halloween and Christmas in 2020, 2021, and 2022, and even a Panda Mameshiba episode, there's always something new to discover in the world of Mameshiba!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
